Headline: Delays Affecting Blue Line Service
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are experiencing delays leaving O'Hare and Forest Park. Update to follow.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are experiencing delays leaving O'Hare and Forest Park.

Expect longer than usual wait times.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
